channel.title: Posts on DJ Lorenzo
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on DJ Lorenzo

item.title: Tromsø Tango Meeting
item.description:
I’m looking forward to djing the Midnight Milonga Sunday May 21 at Tromsø Tango Meeting. Naturally, there is also a Facebook event.

Join me at the northernmost tango event in the world in exotic Tromsø!

item.title: DJing Friday Milonga
item.description: Welcome to the traditional Friday Milonga 2017-02-17 @ Trondheim Tangoklubb!

item.title: Milonga Hi-Fi
item.description:
Welcome to a new stereophonic sound spectacular! For this special night the dj will let all the old 78s rest and play high fidelity recordings only! Nice, acoustic tango, milonga and vals for dancing as always, but recordings from approximately 1970 up until today. Save the date and join in on the fun!

Maja will be your host this sparkling evening. Bring your own bubbles! Facebook event here.

Photo: “Philco Stereophonic High Fidelity, 1960“ (CC BY-NC 2.0) by Roadsidepictures

item.title: This Friday!
item.description:
Don’t miss the first Friday Night Milonga of 2017!

2100-0100 Hs @ Trondheim tangoklubb 2017-01-06. Facebook event

item.title: 2016 Statistics
item.description:
I’ve been using last.fm to collect statistics for several years. The data quality isn’t quite there though, some singers are interpreted as the main artist, which messes up the orchestra totals for instance. So while cleaning up some old playlists, I decided to roll my own stats. According to my accounts, these are the orchestras I played this year (track listing will have to wait for now):

I  was a little surprised D’Arienzo wasn’t in one of the top two places, but I’ll keep an eye on him for the year to come. Best wishes for 2017!

item.title: Other activities 2016
item.description:
While I was too busy to keep this page up to date, I was also djing 2016-11-18, 2016-09-23 and 2016-08-26.

I also did a DJ seminar for future local tango DJs in three installations, the first in August, the second in September and the final one in November.

item.title: Last Friday Milonga of 2016
item.description: The last Friday Night Milonga is coming up 2016-12-16, starting at 21Hs and probably until around 01Hs. Welcome! (Facebook event)

item.title: Extraordinary Milonga on Friday June 24
item.description:
Did you miss the final milonga last week? AFTER milonga to the rescue! With the best of tango, milonga and vals and Chacarera DOBLE! Including short chacarera intro at 9PM Sharp.

https://www.facebook.com/events/526545067546192/

item.title: Next Gig: March 11
item.description: Next up is Friday March 11 @ Bridgehuset. ¡Nos vemos!

item.title: Next up: January 8
item.description: DJing first milonga of the year for Trondheim Tangoklubb Friday January 8:  21:00 at Bridgehuset.

item.title: Festejamos el día del tango
item.description:
Extraordinary milonga at Bridgehuset tonight at 9 PM, celebrating the day of tango.

Facebook-event

item.title: Upcoming Gigs Fall 2014
item.description:
• 2014-08-29 First Milonga of Semester at Bridgehuset (OK, this has already been, stepped in on short notice)

    • 2014-09-20 DJing the Grand Milonga in the marvellous ballroom of Hotel Britannia during the weekend with Maria Plazaola in Trondheim

    • 2014-11-07 Regular Friday Milonga at Bridgehuset

    • 2014-12-12 End of Semester Milonga at Bridgehuset

Regular milongas at Bridgehuset all start at 21:00.

item.title: DJ Seminar
item.description:
DJ Seminar for anyone who wants to become a tango DJ or wants some input to improve as a tango DJ.

Bridgehuset @ 15:00 2014-03-01

Recommended listening:

  • Classics of Argentine Tango

  • Classics of Argentine Tango @ Spotify

Recommended reading:

  • Playing Music for the Milonga: The DJs role

  • TangoDJ discussion group

Other things mentioned during the seminar:

  • Database useful for tagging music collection: tango.info

  • Volume normalization: ReplayGain and EBU R128

  • Music Player Software: Foobar2000 for the TangoDJ
